channel.title: cni on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in cni on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Rebuild Calico for AMD64 ad ARM32V7
item.description: Neither calico nor canal seems to be available for usage yet on ARM32V7 for PI. The attempt here is to cross-compile the calico containers and use them on the PI cluster.

item.title: Deploy Flannel in PI Cluster
item.description: In order to get the nodes and pods interface with each other accross the cluster. This post describes how I deployed Flannel acounting with the fact that some of the nodes have multiple interfaces (wlan0 and eth0).
